layout.default_description: ZATYRANI Association is an organization dedicated to promoting running and other forms of physical activity. Join us!

join.page_subtitle: Become part of our enthusiastic group of runners and Nordic Walking lovers!
join.why_join_description: We are the ZATYRANI association - a group of running and Nordic Walking enthusiasts who not only train together, but also work together for the local community.
join.contact_description: Have questions? Want to join? Call us!
join.contact_note: Don't hesitate! We are open to new members of all ages and skill levels.
join.offer1: Joint running and Nordic Walking training sessions
join.offer5: Joint mountain trips and family outings
join.initiatives_description: Check out what projects we implement for our community!

niebocross.title: NieboCross
niebocross.meta_description: Charity run and Nordic Walking at Bierawka - 12.04.2026 in Nieborowice. Routes 3+ km and 9+ km, 100% of fees for charity.
niebocross.hero_description: Run and Nordic Walking that combine heart, adrenaline, and an amazing route along the Bierawka River. A short 3+ km loop for beginners and a challenging 9+ km cross-country for those who love challenges, and most importantly, everything is for a noble cause.
niebocross.two_routes_desc: We want to bring joy to those who are just starting their sports adventure, and to those looking for a solid dose of adrenaline. Everything is part of our mission: 100% of fees go to support those in need.
niebocross.for_beginners_desc: Short loop for beginner runners and Nordic Walking enthusiasts. Perfect to feel the atmosphere of a real sporting event while supporting a charity cause.
niebocross.for_beginners_point1: Relaxed pace, no rush. Time limit same as for the 9+ km route.
niebocross.for_beginners_point2: Perfect distance to start your adventure with running or Nordic Walking.
niebocross.for_challengers_desc: Technical cross-country route along the Bierawka River. Variable terrain, elevation changes, and beautiful views. Runners and Nordic walkers who like to feel the fire in their legs will be satisfied.
niebocross.for_challengers_point2: Views of Bierawka Valley and shaded forest sections.
niebocross.kids_run_desc: Short, safe races for youngest participants near the start/finish zone.
niebocross.kids_run_point1: We have prepared 3 different distances tailored to the age of the children. Details will be clarified later and emailed to registrants.
niebocross.charity_desc: Together we support the treatment of animals rescued by
niebocross.otoz_desc1: Inspector for Animal Protection OTOZ ANIMALS ‚Äì Gliwice performs a social function, receives no remuneration for this ‚Äì it is charity work.
niebocross.otoz_desc2: Inspectors operate within the scope regulated by the Animal Protection Act.
niebocross.otoz_learn_more: Learn more about the importance of treating rescued animals and see
niebocross.rescue_stories_desc: Learn the stories of animals who were helped thanks to the dedication of OTOZ Animals inspectors.
niebocross.pluto_story: Rescued in a life-threatening condition. Neglected and left alone on a plot, he suffered terrible pain caused by chronic ear inflammation. To save his life, doctors performed middle ear surgery in one ear and opened the ear canal in the other ear. His traumatic past made Pluto a difficult dog showing aggression. Everything changed when he came under the care of our inspector. Today, Pluto no longer has to fight for survival ‚Äì he simply enjoys every day in health and happiness.
niebocross.max_story: Rescued in critical condition: extreme body exhaustion, old fracture, and terrible intestinal damage. He underwent 9 surgeries during which doctors repeatedly lost hope. The surgeries alone cost over 20,000 PLN, and treatment bills keep coming every month. Today his condition is stable, though he will remain in foster care for life. He still requires specialized gastro-type food and regular veterinary visits with blood tests performed several times a year.
niebocross.patryk_story: The horse came into care in a state of extreme emaciation and illness, yet was used in a riding school until the last moment. The road to regaining his health was long and demanding. Dozens of veterinary visits, stays in clinics, costly treatment. Thanks to this, Patryk was able to join our five mares (who also came under our care in difficult condition). There, in the herd, in well-deserved retirement, he enjoyed freedom for the rest of his days.
niebocross.patryk_link_text: If anyone is interested in Patryk's story, we encourage you to watch the report
niebocross.your_logo_desc: Together we can do more for a good cause.
niebocross.adult_run_desc: 100% of entry fee revenue goes to the charity goal.
niebocross.kids_run_fee_desc: 100% of entry fee revenue goes to the charity goal.
niebocross.how_we_support: üìä How do we support the charity goal?
niebocross.support_registrations_desc: 100% of entry fee revenue goes to the charity goal.
niebocross.support_tshirts_desc: 10 PLN from each sold t-shirt goes to the cause, the rest covers production costs.
niebocross.support_partners_desc: Support from partners is transferred to the goal after deducting necessary event organization costs, which we try to limit to the minimum necessary.
niebocross.registration_info: Registration and online payments will be available soon. The buttons above will take you to the form and starting list as soon as they are available.
niebocross.bierawka_desc: The event will take place in the picturesque Bierawka River valley. The 9+ km route runs along the river, offering participants beautiful views and technical challenges. Natural single-tracks, root sections, and World War II trenches create an ideal cross-country route for trail running enthusiasts.
niebocross.photo_full_gallery: Full photo gallery by Pawe≈Ç is available
niebocross.heart_crane_desc: The heart symbolizes the charity of the event, and the crane spreads its wings of protection over people dedicating their time to others. Cranes are frequent guests in Nieborowice ‚Äì in early spring you can hear their loud mating songs, which we hope will accompany participants at the start.
niebocross.start_finish_desc: Main square of Nieborowice village, by the kindergarten.
niebocross.surface_desc: Forest paths, gravel, technical sections with roots. Trail shoes recommended.
niebocross.attractions_desc: Animations and games for children, and a small activity zone at the start/finish.
niebocross.contact_section_desc: We're here to help! For any questions about registration, payment, or the event, contact us.

login.code_info: If your account is registered, you will receive an email with an authentication code within approximately 5 minutes. If no email has arrived and you don't have any message from us in spam, this means you are not yet registered and you should

errors.rodo_required: You must accept the GDPR consent
errors.terms_required: You must accept the event terms and conditions
errors.db_error: A technical problem occurred. Contact the organizer: https://zatyrani.pl/niebocross#kontakt
errors.rate_limit: Too many attempts. Try again in an hour.
errors.code_store_error: Failed to generate code. Try again.
errors.email_not_sent: Email was not sent. Contact the organizer.
errors.invalid_code_contact: If you're entering the code from your email and still see this error

form.contact_person_desc: This will be the main contact person for this registration
form.rodo_consent: I hereby declare that I consent to the processing of my personal data by the Event Organizer (Zatyrani Association) for purposes related to the organization, preparation and conduct of the event. At the same time, I declare that I consent to the Organizer sending me information about this event to my e-mail address. I also declare that all data and information provided by me, related to my participation in the event, are true and factual. (on behalf of minors, the declaration is made by a parent / adult guardian).
form.check_spam: Didn't receive the code? Check your SPAM folder
form.phone_help: Make sure you provide correct phone number as we will need it in case of emergency or to notify you about important changes related to the competition
form.tshirt_info: Production cost: 70 PLN, To charity: 10 PLN
form.hide_name_public: Hide my name on public participants list
form.kids_run_info: For kids: specific distance will be assigned automatically on event day based on child's age. Details will be emailed.

panel.confirm_delete_participant: Are you sure you want to delete this participant?

partner.title: Gratisownia.pl
partner.paragraph1: Our partnership with Gratisownia.pl began in 2020. Thanks to this collaboration, we grew from a small running group into the large ZATYRANI GRATISOWNIA.PL GMINA PILCHOWICE Association.
partner.paragraph2: We can always count on the support of our partner, while boldly looking to the future - achieving the goals we set.

halfmarathon.title: Wilczy Half Marathon
halfmarathon.modal_body: Registration for the half marathon has not started yet. Write to us at
halfmarathon.modal_body_end: and we will inform you when it becomes available.
halfmarathon.paragraph1: The half marathon route (approximately 22km) runs through the forests of the Rybnik Forest District, specifically through the beautiful forest trails of the "G≈Çƒôbokie Do≈Çy" forest reserve.
halfmarathon.paragraph2: The reserve is a remnant of an ancient primeval forest that once covered these areas. The unique microclimate, richness of flora and fauna, as well as the natural rarity of native, protected plant species make this place attractive both from a natural and tourist perspective.
halfmarathon.paragraph3: You won't find another half marathon like this in Silesia. Welcome to Wilcza!
halfmarathon.attraction1: We guarantee a large dose of adrenaline.
halfmarathon.attraction2: Guaranteed satisfaction for runners who love cross-country running in beautiful, wild, forest terrain.
halfmarathon.attraction5: Every year there's always a runner who has to look for their shoe in the one magical place where an ordinary puddle turns into a muddy trap.
halfmarathon.photos_full_gallery: Full photo gallery by Pawe≈Ç is available
halfmarathon.race_office_location: Cultural Center in Wilcza, Karola Miarki 123, 44-189 Wilcza

members_content.member_1: To keep things exciting, she started running with Runmageddons. She became a veteran and switched to mountain running. She loves marathon and ultra difficult routes. As befits a wild one, in 2022 she completed the Butcher's 80 km distance. Now she's temporarily battling with poles. After healing her injury, she announces she'll return to mountain trails.
members_content.member_3: Running since 2018. Loves forest running and mountain trips, and in winter cold baths. Nordic Walking instructor.
members_content.member_5: Running since 2014. The longest distance she spontaneously completed is a 67km ultramarathon. Dreams of a marathon in Iceland.
members_content.member_7: I run because I play hockey.
members_content.member_10: Running since 2018. Runs slowly because she can.
members_content.member_11: Likes to run barefoot and drink water from the river.
members_content.member_12: Several ultra races under her belt and she earned the Polish Marathon Crown. Today she covers kilometers with her dog friend.
members_content.member_13: While running, always looking for a bike.
members_content.member_15: Running since 2017. Likes long distances. Has several marathons and ultra races to her credit. Dreams of doing a triathlon.
members_content.member_16: Likes uphills and passing other competitors there. Zatyrani's golden hands. Isotonic drink specialist.
members_content.member_17: I haven't reached the finish line yet, but I'm closer than yesterday.
members_content.member_19: Running since 2013. Completed the Polish Half Marathon Crown. Working on the Polish Marathon Crown. Entering ultra races.
members_content.member_24: Started his running adventure with a relay in Wilcza, it was supposed to be 2 laps around the field and he's still running today... Now he prefers forest runs and walks with poles üòä
members_content.member_25: Nordic Walking instructor, motivates for training, planner of forest expeditions and "almost" the best photographer of these wanderings.
members_content.member_26: I run because when ZOMBIES come, they'll eat the slower ones.
members_content.member_27: Over a decade of running turned me into a crown collector, marathon and ultra wholesaler including hundreds at the forefront. Apparently I can also sit down...but there are no witnesses.
members_content.member_28: Walking with poles since 2018. Nordic Walking instructor.
members_content.member_30: Girl with baked goods - I run for sweets.
members_content.member_31:
Loves Andrzej, but the one who loves her ‚ù§Ô∏è

Feels at home in the mountains, conquers every trail with poles, and a marathon is only a matter of time üí™
members_content.member_32: I walk with poles because I like it. Nordic Walking Team are the girls thanks to whom every moment is bursts of laughter. Join us for training. See for yourself!
members_content.member_33: I run because I like it üòÖüòÄ
members_content.member_35: My comfortable distance is 10 km, but I regularly step out of my comfort zone to check where the limit is (and if it's really there üòâ)
members_content.member_36:
Loves Asia ‚ù§Ô∏è

Started his modest running debut with Zatyrani at the Wilczy Half Marathon.
members_content.member_38: I run to eat more cookies ü§©
members_content.member_39: Loves walks, sightseeing and marching with poles. Maybe one day he'll walk around the whole world.
members_content.member_43:
Nature is the place where I rest, clear my head and charge my batteries.
Sorry, the poles are ringing, I have to go üòä
